hero.header1: Your platform to understand and analyze
hero.description: An innovative platform that simplifies complex medical reports, provides health recommendations, and offers a trusted medical team to answer your questions.
hero.explanationSample:
Hemoglobin (Hemoglobin):

Result: 13.5 g/dL

Status: Normal

Explanation: Your hemoglobin level is within the normal range, indicating no issues related to anemia.

tracking.title: Tracking and Record Keeping
tracking.description: Users can store all their health reports within the platform, enabling them to track their health progress over time and review any changes or improvements.

recommendations.title: Health Recommendations
recommendations.description: Based on analysis results, personalized medical advice is offered to improve users' health. These recommendations may include dietary changes or general health tips.

prediction.title: Health Prediction
prediction.description: Based on report analysis and past data, the system provides predictions on potential symptoms or health issues that may arise in the future.
